title: Reckoning
description: Five years ago Holly Adams did the unthinkable, she beat the devil and saved the world.Leaving behind the Immortal world Holly is busy raising her 4 year old son, and supporting a depressed best friend through a divorce. For once Holly Adams has normal problems. Until her son is targeted by new foes. Suddenly Holly finds herself back in a world that would devour her whole. Along side familiar faces she must enter the fray one more time in order to save her son. But will she make it out the other side? In this new chapter loyalties are blurred and tested, friendships broken and allies betrayed. Also available in a special edition featuring over 40 pages of additional, never before released, material and more!
author: Holly Vane
